name: META X CITY
description: META X CITY is a distributed hybrid virtual platform focusing on the GameFi chain game section. It is committed to combining the ecological applications of the NFT+DEFI section. It constructs a cross-chain bridge based on the concept of global decentralization and aggregates various global brand IP. Create (DAO) decentralized autonomous management, a comprehensive commercialization agreement that is perpendicular to the chain game market, and shape an open, transparent, decentralized and complete ecological value project.
